title: A Reproducible Workflow for Structural-Functional Connectome Sampling and Analysis
description: PyNets harnesses the power of Nipype, Nilearn, Dipy, and Networkx packages to automatically generate graphical ensembles on a subject-by-subject basis, using any combination of graph-generating hyperparameters. PyNets utilities can be integrated with any existing preprocessing workflow, and a docker container is provided to facilitate complete reproducibility of executions.

creators.name: Pisner, Derek
creators.affiliation: Department of Psychology, University of Texas at Austin, TX, USA
